subject: OEM Vs Boxed.
body: This perfection, this absence.Swaying in unison beneath the snow,Of a far barn, just where the road curves sharplyArchangel Winter, darkness on his backWrithing their stunted limbs,Green lilac buds appear that won't surviveThis perfection, this absence.Empty streets I come upon by chance,Beneath the snowflakes I notice façadesDown the long course of the gray slush of thingsGlimmering of light:So you can watch me watch uplifted snowColumbuses or Gamas, ever pass,Snow haze gleams like sand.Seized from creation by nonentity,The high whites spread over the buried earth.Silence. Your way of being. Your way of seeingOnly a fox whose den I cannot find.Your gloved hands covering your lips' good-bye
